objects.query: Select Name, Phone, Type, Website, Industry, Ownership, BillingStreet, BillingCity, BillingState, BillingPostalCode, BillingCountry, Handcrafted_for_eWRTS_Demo_Scenario__c, RecordTypeId from Account WHERE Handcrafted_for_eWRTS_Demo_Scenario__c = true AND RecordType.DeveloperName = 'eWRTS_Customer_Account'

SELECT FirstName, LastName, Email, Phone, MobilePhone, Title, Salutation, MailingStreet, MailingCity, MailingPostalCode, MailingState, MailingCountry, Fax, AccountId, Handcrafted_for_eWRTS_Demo_Scenario__c, RecordTypeId FROM Contact where Handcrafted_for_eWRTS_Demo_Scenario__c = true AND RecordType.DeveloperName = 'eWRTS_Custom_Contact'
SELECT Id, AccountId, BusinessHoursId, Name,SlaProcessId, SvcApptBookingWindowsId,StartDate,Type,Status FROM Entitlement
